description: Take the picture in a well-lit area with good lighting on the face.
Position the camera at eye level with the subject's face.
Avoid any obstructions such as glasses or hats that cover the face.
The subject should look directly at the camera and keep a neutral expression.
Take multiple pictures from different angles and with different lighting conditions to increase accuracy.
Ensure that the face is not partially hidden by hands or other objects.
Only authorized personnel are allowed to add users to the database. Users who do not belong to the organization should not be added.
The subject must provide their consent to be added to the database.
The subject must provide accurate and up-to-date information, including their name.
The subject must meet the organization's criteria for being added to the database.
We take the privacy and security of our users seriously, and any misuse or abuse of the facial recognition system will not be tolerated.
